name: CANCER_RISK_REQ_INFO
description: This table contains the externally requested cancer risk scores info for a patient.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: SCORE_REQ_USER_ID
columns.description: This column stores the user who requested cancer risk scores.

columns.name: SCORE_REQ_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: SCORE_REQ_INST_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: This column stores the instant when the user requested the cancer risk scores. This column always stores a UTC instant value with no time zone marker.
